title: Source-Free Cross-Modal Knowledge Transfer by Unleashing the Potential of Task-Irrelevant Data. (arXiv:2401.05014v1 [cs.CV])
abstract: Source-free cross-modal knowledge transfer is a crucial yet challenging task, which aims to transfer knowledge from one source modality (e.g., RGB) to the target modality (e.g., depth or infrared) with no access to the task-relevant (TR) source data due to memory and privacy concerns. A recent attempt leverages the paired task-irrelevant (TI) data and directly matches the features from them to eliminate the modality gap. However, it ignores a pivotal clue that the paired TI data could be utilized to effectively estimate the source data distribution and better facilitate knowledge transfer to the target modality. To this end, we propose a novel yet concise framework to unlock the potential of paired TI data for enhancing source-free cross-modal knowledge transfer. translated_title: 无源跨模态知识转移方法：释放无用任务数据的潜力
translated_abstract: 无源跨模态知识转移是一项重要且具有挑战性的任务，它旨在在没有任务相关源数据的情况下将知识从一个源模态（例如，RGB）转移到目标模态（例如，深度或红外）中，原因是由于内存和隐私问题。最近的一项尝试利用成对的任务无关性（TI）数据，并直接匹配它们的特征来消除模态差异。然而，它忽略了一个关键线索，即成对的TI数据可以用于有效估计源数据分布并更好地促进向目标模态的知识转移。为此，我们提出了一种新颖而简洁的框架，来发挥成对的TI数据在增强无源跨模态知识转移方面的潜力。我们的工作得到了两个关键技术组成部分的支持。首先，为了更好地估计源数据分布，我们引入了一个任务无关数据引导的模态桥接（TGMB）模块。它将目标模态数据翻译为与源模态特征匹配的形式。
tldr: 本论文提出了一种无源跨模态知识转移方法，通过解锁无用任务数据的潜力，利用成对的任务无关数据来估计源数据分布并促进知识转移。该方法采用了Task-irrelevant data-Guided Modality Bridging (TGMB)模块来更好地估计源数据分布。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a source-free cross-modal knowledge transfer method that unlocks the potential of task-irrelevant data to estimate the source data distribution and facilitate knowledge transfer. The method utilizes a Task-irrelevant data-Guided Modality Bridging (TGMB) module to better estimate the source data distribution.
